More recently I was given a chance to review this 303 Vinyl Protective Cleaner and it works incredibly well.  I sprayed this onto the door panels of my 5 year old Mazda and it immediately brought them back to life.  They went from looking like dull black plastic to having the rich almost leather-like appearance of when it was new.  I also tried some Armor All on one of the rear doors (just for comparison) and while it looked better than when it was untreated, it looked artificial and more like a shiny plastic then a rich leather.  Also worth noting is that 3 weeks after applying both products the 303 treated door panel still looks nice while the Armor all is starting to dull.  The only downside to this 303 vinyl protectant is that it costs about 50% more than other protectants I have purchased but the results make it worth it

The Motorola Dual Mode Baby Monitor is a decent baby monitor albeit at a high price. What sets this apart from other video baby monitors is that it comes with 2 cameras that can be used with the included screen (parent unit) and can also be viewed over wifi.  This is great for parents that want to watch over their kids while the babysitter or nanny is at home.  The cameras themselves have the ability to pan and tilt so they can be moved remotely to cover just about any sized room.  I have used this as a "nanny cam" as well as a security monitor to overlook my driveway and backyard to see when people come up to my house.  The video is clear and the ability to send notifications when motion is detected is very useful.to keep track of who is coming up while you are away.  The nightvision is about average, it definitely works but is not any better or worse than other video monitors that I have used in the past.  Also worth noting is that there are some delays in the audio and video but this is true with every video monitor.  Overall this is a great set although at a high price.*** Positive Points: ***- Can be viewed over wifi using the web portal- Parent unit can be used with the included battery pack or plugged in with the included adapter- Cameras can be moved (pan and tilt) remotely via the parent unit or via wifi- 2 way communication is possible via parent unit or via wifi (albeit with some audio delay)- Has the ability to send notification when movement is detected as well as take snapshots or video remotely- Video quality is very good over wifi, though the included parent unit has a screen with only average resolution*** Negative Points: ***- Price is high even for a dual camera setup- Parent unit has an average resolution display, the video is much better when viewed on a phone, tablet, or pc- There is some delay in the audio/video but this is true of all baby monitors/ webcams- Does not have a VOX (Voice activation) feature on parent unit so the video wont just turn on when the baby makes a sound.

This Five Star Expanding File is a great way to get organized.  I use this inside of my messenger bag and simply pull this out when I get to work.  I can keep a fairly decent number of pages in its 6 pockets and they are easily accessible.  The top has a loop closure which works great at keeping the top closed.  The construction seems durable and should hopefully last.  The price is very reasonable with the downside being that the design, while modern looking, appears a too casual for business use.  There is nothing wrong with it per say, only that it looks informal for serious business use.  Other than that, this is a great file storage.

My daughter often wakes up with a stuffy nose.  We have been using "Vicks" for years but I was given a chance to try out this product.  It is a bit different than the Vicks Vaporub we have been using.  We sprayed this onto a cloth near where she sleeps.  The effect was pretty quick and her stuffy nose was better and she went back to sleep.  The smell itself is fairly pleasant though ti does tend to linger on the item it was sprayed on.  For us this is a plus because it helps her the following night as well.  The only big downside to this product is that it is a bit pricey.  We will continue to use this to see how long it lasts when compared to a bottle of Vicks Vaporub.

The Matchbox Dino Trapper Trailer is great fun for its intended age group.  The jeep features rockets that launch and the dinosaur makes sounds when hit.  If you hit him enough he collapses and the jeep can then haul him away.  It seems like a simple old school concept but it is great for imaginative play.  Both toys seem well built and seem durable enough to hold up to a 3 year olds abuse.  The downside is that the dinosaur runs on button cell batteries which are more difficult find.  Other than that this is a great toy for its intended age group.

$13 bucks seems like a lot to pay for relatively simple binder.  There are 3 rings to hold approximately 300 sheets... nothing fancy there.  The exterior is made of a flexible type material that is not flimsy but not super durable either... again nothing fancy. The design does look modern but looks more busy than fashionable, dare I say not fancy enough?  The included divider is sturdy and has pockets for papers... it really is the one nice surprise with this binder... something kinda fancy after all.  Unfortunately this Five Star Binder does not offer enough to make it worth its relatively high price.  It would be a decent purchase at a lower price point but  you can buy a more durable and more "fancy" binder for around the same money.

The Woods 6 Outlet Metal Surge protector is a good basic surge protector though it offers very few new or innovative features.  The sliding covers come in handy in dusty environments such as construction areas or where wood is being cut so you can prevent dust from entering into unused outlets. The metal construction is nice but does not seem to be any better or worse than other all plastic surge protectors that I have used.  The 3 foot cord is a bit on the short side and though the outlets themselves are nicely spaced, you are better off with a split (3+3) style surge protector if you have large adapters you need to plug in.  Furthermore, what makes this surge protector only average are the features that it lacks such as USB ports, power conservation outlets, or even a longer cord.  These features can be had for a similar or slightly higher price tag.

I got these postcards to create reminders for a party.  The Avery template was easy to find and I  was able to print a batch very quickly.  A few of the guests actually asked me where I had the postcards made and they were shocked that i did them at home.  The only downside is that the laser version of these appear a bit thin.  It works well but it is not as thick as a normal postcard would be.

Our neighborhood has a big problem with "pet" cats.  I am not sure how a pet can be allowed to roam around for the majority of the day and night and only come in when its time to eat.  The rest of the 23.5 hours in a day these cats seem to love fighting and making crazy mating sounds.  This is ok in the daytime but at night it can really make it difficult to sleep.  I was given a chance to try this Havahart Animal Repellent and I can say that the number of cats fighting and fornicating outside my window has decreased.  Another benefit is that possums seem to roam around la lot less in my backyard. This product really is great but it has a significant downside which is cost.  If it were cheaper this would be an excellent products

These tags are great for labeling items such as with prices or for storage.  The tags are made of manila and have a reinforced hole.  The wire that comes with this is durable and will affix to just about anything.  When bought in a quantity of 1000 these work out to be about 3-4 cents/ tag which is reasonable.  The only real downside was that the packaging was not exactly strong or secure.  It was a simple box with all of the tags and wires just floating around.  Other than that this is a good product.

The Classic Accessories Patio Table Cover proved to be a great way to protect a coffee table in our back yard patio.  Though the area is covered we always had an issue with dust and dew making the table look messy.  This cover proved to be a great fit and it is easy to remove when needed yet it provides excellent dust protection.  The cover is water proof though I have not really been able to test this out.  The only real concern with this cover is that because it made to specific dimensions you must ensure that it will fit your coffee table or else it will look a bit odd.

My son uses this mouth piece when sparring for his martial arts class.  The previous mouthpiece that he used came with his gear kit and though it was cheaper he always felt like he had to remove it after some time.  This Shock Doctor proved to be a good choice for him.  It fits well and offers great protection and the flavor allows him to wear it for longer periods than his other guard.  The only real drawback is that this one costs about twice what his other mouth guard cost but other than that this is a great product.

Although this quick wax can be used on most surfaces that you would traditionally use a normal wax on, it is made more for boat use.  It has a mild cleaning effect though you are Better off properly washing the area to be waxed.  It goes on easily and hazes fairly fast.  The problem is that it is a bit difficult to remove once hazed.  I tried this on a friend's boat and the results were fairly good although after just 2 trips in the water it's effect was diminished and it looked like we may need another touch up.  I am not sure if the hot sun and salt water made this less durable but it definitely did not hold up add well as i though it would.

When I first got this Nature Bound Bug Vacuum for my son he was really excited to open the package.  Usually he is fearful of bugs but this actually motivated him to turn off his Netflix and explore the yard.  At first he was disappointed because the suction on the vacuum was really low.  I changed the included batteries to fresh ones and he was able to easily pick up all the bugs he could find.  The visualization chamber is really cool and he was examining little critters the same enthusiasm that my generation once did.  The only downside to the vacuum is that the plastic did seem a bit cheap and it did not look like our could survive a drop,  other than that this is a great way to Getty your kids to appreciate nature.

My wife had used cranberry juice in the past to prevent UTIs.  The juice tend to change your urine to make inhospitable for bacteria.  I thought these pills would be a great alternative.  Unfortunately the pills are a but hard to swallow and the recommended dose is 4 pills in a day.  It is a lot easier to just drink a small glass of cranberry juice everyday than to have to take several of these.

When I first received this table cloth it looked very attractive.  However, once I opened the packaging and spread this onto my dining table I began to notice that the material had several flaws.  They were not terrible but they were obvious.  This product sells for over $30 which is not exactly a bargain and is not cheap enough to ignore the flaws in the fabric  The color and the border are very nice, I only wish the construction and durability were on par with the design.

The Rick Bayless Ceramic Baker is a high quality baking dish that can be used for a variety of food types.  The feature that stands out with this dish is the red exterior which looks great when setting out on a table after baking in the oven.  The dish appears to be well made with a built in lip on the sides which make it easy to grab.  Unfortunately there is no included lid and the oval shape limits the quantity of food being prepared.  Another negative is the relatively high price considering the size of this dish.*** Positive Points: ***- Heats evenly and does a good job of cooking- Easy to cleanup- Red color is attractive and looks great when serving*** Negative Points: ***- High Price- Does not come with a lid- Oval shape is not as efficient as a square or rectangular baking dish

These Avery Tabbed Snap In Bookmark Plastic Dividers are, as the description says, tabbed snap in bookmarks.  A number of reviews here have given this a lower review because of this feature but it is very clearly stated that these are not ordinary dividers.  I found these to be very useful to quickly mark subject areas for later review.  The Dividers can be moved easily without opening the rings of your binder which is very handy in a classroom or library setting.  These dividers are not perfect, and honestly seem a bit pricey but if you need an easy way and quick way to divide sections of your notebook these are very handy.

My grandmother used to tell us how turmeric was important to take for to prevent infections and reduce inlfammation.  She also would make sure to cook with plenty of ginger because she said it was important for our health as we got older. Fast forward 20 years and I am now given the chance to evalute these Sundown Naturals Ayurvedic Balance Joint Health  which contain tumeric and ginger.  If you don't cook with these ingredients then this is a great way to supplement.  The pills are easy to swallow without the strong flavor of ginger or tumeric.  They are vegetarian safe and I found that the recommended dose is higher than what I need so for me 1 pill per day is enough.  Considering this has 90 pills it is a reasonable price but a bit on the high side.  Nonetheless these are a great way to naturally decrase inflammation and improve joint health.

If you are simply looking for a WiFi camera this product is not for you.  You can buy much cheaper WiFi security cameras or baby monitors that will do similar WiFi video and audio  This Petcube WiFi camera is made specifically for pet owners that want a way to interact with their pets while away from home.  The 2 way audio is a pretty common feature these days but the Petcube takes it a notch further by allowing you to control a laser pointer from its smartphone app.  The Laser pointer moves and is sure to entertain your pet (at least for the first few uses)..  The broadcasting and ability to easily setup a live feed for others to watch is a very unique feature.  This makes it easy for other Petcube owners to easily view your camera feed (if you allow them to).  Overall the sharing and broaddcasting features make this a unique product that proud pet owners will love.*** Positive Points: ***- Easy Setup that simply requires you to download the app and connect to the Petcube.  After that just enter your WiFi network and password and the software does the rest- Good Quality video- Laser Pointer is nice novelty that is fun for the pets (and also kids)-  Easy to share videos with other Petcube owners.  Also makes it easy to set up your own content streaming- Good quality construction that seems durable and should hold up to occasional rough handling from your pets- Uses a common micro USB cable so in the event it gets lost it can be easily replaced*** Negative Points: ***- High Price especially when you consider equivalent webcams can be a fraction of this price.- Large size make it hard to place discretely for everyday use- It uses a lot of bandwidth so there may be some video or audio lag- The app should have options to set video quality (for those with slower connections)- Laser pointer can be controlled by others if you chose to broadcast your videos

A lot of people think that supplements and natural medicines are all phoney and the people who benefit from them simply go through the placebo effect.  This couldn't be father from the truth.  Pharmaceutical companies are  always looking to plants to try and give them the basis of their new "miracle cures."  Ayurveda had been around for thousands of years so the pharmaceutical companies cannot patent those medicines. Like most medicines their effects aren't the same for everyone.  When you consider that most auyervedic medicines come from plants which can have different levels of acive ingredients depending on where and when they are grown.  A heavy rainy season or a drought can increase or decrease the active ingredient of the plant.  With all this in mind, you shouldn't discount "natural" medicines simply because they don't work for everyone.The Sundown Ayurvedic Stress relief supplemets feature Ashwaganda root extract.  The pill is quite large but easy to swallow.  The capsule is vegetarian safe which means it doesnt have any gelatin or animal products.  My wife tends to be a type A personality so she suffers from chronic stress.  She tried one of these pills (the recommended dose is 3 but she wanted to start off small) and she noticed that she had a more restful sleep than usual.  The pill did not make her less stressed (only removing the stress can do that) but it did allow her to get a more restful sleep which helped her to deal with the stress a lot better.  She agreed to take the medicine regularly and has felt a lot better and a lot more rested.  Her stress still remains but her ability to cope with the stress is improved.Overall this is a great product.  The price seems high until you consider it has 90 pills and about on par with a 90 day supply of vitamins from my local pharmacy.

I used this on an Apple iPhone5 and also temporarily on an iPhone 6.  It worked without any issues.  I used it to charge both phones when connected to an original iPhone charger and also a generic 5V wall charger.  One major thing to note is that this cable is only 6 inches long so make sure it will reach your phone from its power point.  The other issue that I have with this cable is its price.  $18 bucks on a 6 inch cable is excessive.  Other than that if you need a short replacement cable for your iPhone then this is great.

A water bottle is just a water bottle right?  Not quite.  Contigo has managed to really improve on the water bottle and take it to a very unique and different playing field.  The Ashland Water Bottle is a great example of this.  The push button opening allows you to have access to your water only when you need it, no chance of spills or accidents.  The lock on the push button further ensures that your bottle won't accidentally open and leave you with a wet workout bag.  The bottle has a built in carabiner which makes it easy to clip this bottle to your bag so no chance of you dropping it or forgetting it.  The construction of this bottle is first rate with a very sturdy plastic that will resist shattering or breaking even when dropped fully loaded.  The only downside to this bottle is that you must drink from the built in straw so it makes "air drinking" or sharing of the bottle all but impossible.  Otherwise this is the perfect water bottle at a very reasonable price.

The Alps Extreme Traverse X Is an extremely versatile backpack that can be modified for a variety of outdoor uses such as hunting, camping, and even hiking.  The backpack is very durable and made of a soft touch material that seems like it should hold up to a lot of abuse.  It has numerous hidden features such as a rain cover and foldable "meat shelf."  The padded back makes this comfortable to wear even when fully loaded.  This is not a lightweight backpack and it is large but it feels a lot lighter and smaller than it is.  The only major downside to this bag is its extreme price, but considering its combination of flexibility and durability some may find this to be worth the hefty price tag.*** Positive Points: ***- Heavy duty soft touch material- highly configurable with numerous clips and options to create more storage space- side "wings" also have storage pouches for your phone or other small items such as ammunition- has 2 mesh water bottle pockets- has molded foam on the back which makes it comfortable to wear- zippers have pull loops that make it easy to open- padded shoulder straps make this easy to carry even when loaded*** Negative Points: ***- Heavy. It is comfortable to wear but it is not meant for fast trekking- High Price- Lower pocket that holds the "meat shelf" is somewhat hard to open- A bit on the large side

I installed this on the driver's side of an older Saturn Vue.  I also installed a cheaper brand (Pylon) wiper blade on the passenger side of the same car.  Both were equally easy to install.  The blade portion appeared to be made of the same quality rubber though the steel of the Bosch brand did seem to be a bit heavier gauge. Both blades are quiet and clean equally well.  I have installed these in the middle of summer so I will update this review as time goes on to see which of these two blades lasts longer.  The Bosch costs about $2.00 more than the Pylon brand so it is roughly 30% more costly.  I will update this review to see if the Bosch is worth the extra money.

I was supposed to receive this Mega Blocks Monster High Moviemobile but instead received the Graveyard Garden Party Building Set.  I will be honest that I was a little creeped out by the concept of a monster set for my 5 year old daughter.  Once she got the package she was so excited that she began opening it right away.  It was a bit too hard for her to build so her 10 year old brother had to help her.  The instructions really did help and once t was built it was fairly sturdy though as expected some pieces did fall off (as they do on Lego sets).  Overall this ended up being a very fun playset that girls will definitely enjoy.  Unfortunately my daughter did not really appreciate the building aspect of this but nonetheless it is a good playset at a very good price when compared to Lego playsets.

Case Logic makes some of the best camera cases available and this KDM 101 is no exception.  The first thing to note about this case is that it will NOT hold a standard sized DSLR camera in any way that could be considered safe.  I am not sure how some of the other reviewers are saying they were able to fit their DSLR (Canon T5) with a lens into this case but even the product description mentions that this is made for compact sensor cameras (AKA micro 4/3 sensor or mirror-less cameras).  You may be able to squeeze in a Canon EOS if you put it in sideways but you will risk some damage to your camera if the case drops).  I have attached a couple of photos so you can see this case (on the right) and how it compares with the taller KDH101.  As long as your are comfortable with the smaller size of this case it is a great way to store and protect your camera.  Personally I prefer Case Logic's Hammock Suspension Cases (such as the KDM 101) which suspend your camera allowing it to be stored safely while making it easy to access quickly.  Both Cases are excellent with the only downside being that they are a bit pricey.*** Positive Points: ***- Hard plastic base protects against bumps and small drops- Has a total of zippered pockets in addition to the main compartment (2 on the sides, one in the front and one on the top lid).- All the zippers have small pulls to make it easier to zip and unzip the case- Handle is integrated into the lid which makes it easy to pick up- Main compartment has a high contrast green lining and also a green zipper which makes it easy to see at night- Interior compartment has a divider that can easily be moved to the side- Lightweight while offering very good protection*** Negative Points: ***-  Does not have a "hammock" suspension system for your camera like the Case Logic KDH101.-  No waterproof cover (though the zippered areas all have a raised lip to prevent moisture from entering the compartments)-  Price is a bit on the high side

We have a large sliding door in our living and have had issues with birds flying into the glass.  We always hoped the birds were not injured but we never new there was a way to prevent the birds from mistakenly flying into the glass.  When I got a chance to review these Bird's Eye View Window Film I was excited to see if these would work.  They were very easy to install and they actually looked attractive.  Some of our guests even thought they were a design built into the glass.  I am also happy to report that It has been almost a month since we applied these and not a single bird has hit the glass.  This product is works well, is easy to use, attractive, and reasonably priced which means it is nothing less than 5 stars.

I have gone through many keyboards over the years.  I have tried USB, wireless, Bluetooth, just about every keyboard technology that has come out I have tried.  I have used my phone and tablet with a couple of Bluetooth portable keyboards and while they worked fairly well, they were small and a bit cramped.  To make matters worse, my tablets did not quite fit into the slots so there was always a risk that they would topple over or fall off the keyboard.  This Belkin Keyboard proved to be a  very simple solution to make my computing a lot easier.The Keyboard works with just about any tablet or phone with a micro USB slot. My Dell Venue fit into its stand perfectly and once plugged in it worked without a hitch.  I also used it with my Samsung Note 4 Cell Phone and it worked perfectly.  The Keyboard  itself is constructed very well and has some weight to it.  This is not a portable keyboard so it is the perfect size to get some serious work done on a tablet or phone.  The stand portion of the keyboard is very stable and my Dell Venue Pro 8 fit in the slot even with its cover on.  Overall this is a great keyboard for productivity.*** Positive Points: ***- Works with most devices that have a micro-usb port (I used this with a  Samsung Note 4 phone and a Dell Venue Pro 8 Tablet)- Great construction that is heavy weight and looks like it will last- Keys are nicely spaced for fast typing- Keyboard has Media keys for Volume, Play, FWD, and Rewind- Easy to setup... just plug it into the micro USB port and you are done-  Cord can be stored under the Keyboard- Does not require any batteries and it has a very negligible impact on your device battery- Has dedicated Android Keys that can also function with Windows*** Negative Points: ***- The solid construction and durable material make this rather heavy- Not very portable

I have a number of LED lights around the house and I needed an outdoor motion sensor near a corner of the house.  This Fulcrun light worked perfectly for the purpose.  It provides a nice bright light and the motion sensor works great.  The only downside is that IT takes D sized batteries which adds considerable weight.  I wish this took the more common AA size instead.  Other than that this errors great.

The Case Logic KDH-101 is a compact DSLR case that can accommodate a standard zoom lens.  I have a Cannon T4i with a 55-250 mm lens and it fit fairly well.  The Camera's width is a bit snug on top but it did fit.  If you camera is significantly wider than the T4 then you may want to consider a larger case.  This case has a solid bottom to protect from minor drops and it has the "hammock" setup which means your camera is suspended (lens down) through a fabric material.  This setup sounds scary at first but it works very well at protecting your camera and making it easily accessible.  This case is great at being compact yet providing good protection from minor bumps or drops.Although this case offers a great design and good protection,  my personal favorite case is the Case Logic SLRC 202 which more easily accommodates my camera and also has room for 2 extra lens or an external flash.  Also if you have a larger zoom lens you may want to consider the Case Logic DSH-103 which has an expandable base to make it fit just about any size zoom lens.  I have included a couple of pictures of each of these cases so you have a rough idea of the size differences along with a Cannon T4i for reference.  This KDH-101 is in the middle and is the smallest.  The DSH-103 (with the larger zoom capacity) is on the right and the SLRC 202 (with more storage space) is on the left.*** Positive Points: ***- Hammock system works well at suspending your camera- Has 2 pockets on each side along with a pocket  in front and on the top lid of the case (total of 4 pockets) which allows for storage of smaller items such as batteries, memory cards and filters.- Green contrast stitching is easy to see at night*** Negative Points: ***- Cannot accommodate larger zoom lenses- No waterproof cover- Not enough storage for anything other than the charger, batteries, or filters

The Fisher- Price Silly Wheelie Mickey is a great toy for its intended age group of 2-5 years old.  The toy was a lot larger than I expected but it was very well made and looks like it will hold up over the years.  It is very easy to use requiring your child to simply press the flag on the back causing it to move and do silly stunts.  It is a lot of fun and kept the kids engaged for a long time.  The only downside to this toy is its relatively high price but other than that this is a great toy.

The Zak! Designs Placemat is a great way to protect your table from everything your little ones can throw or spill on it.  I use theses for my 4 year old daughter and they work perfectly.  I have one on the dining table which makes cleanup easy without having to worry about her food on the tablecloth.  I also use one under her table where she does her arts and crafts and this prevents paint and glue from ruining the table's finish.  They are bright and colorful and are very easy to wipe clean.  Considering the price these are an excellent buy.

The Panasonic Foldz Collapsible Travel Headphones are a decent buy for anyone looking for midrange wired headphones.  They are very light weight and a lot more comfortable than in the ear headphones.  Your ears will get hot if you wear these for extended periods of time since they are not breathable but they were still more comfortable than most in-ear headphones.  The sound quality itself is acceptable but nothing great.  The sound is focused more on the midrange with very little deep bass and only a slight amount of treble.  They are not the worst sounding headphones out there but they are far from the best.  Overall these are a decent buy considering the price but audiophiles should look elsewhere.*** Positive Points: ***- Decent build quality that is lightweight and comfortable- Folding design takes up less space in your bag- Has a built in microphone and call pickup switch*** Negative Points: ***- Sound is only average quality with good separation but  focused on mid range sound with little bass and treble delineation- No track controls- No carrying case included

3M is a master when it comes to creating privacy filters for screens.  I have used their products at work and on personal laptops when screen security is necessary.  This 3M Privacy Protector the iPhone 6 is  a great way to add privacy protection to your phone.  Application is very easy... anyone who has ever applied a screen protector to a phone will have no problem at all.  The protector is slightly shorter than the actual screen size but this is intentional to make it easier to apply.  Once applied it will protect your screen from scratches and also prevent anyone from being to see your screen unless they are looking directly at it.  If you don't need the security/privacy then you can buy a screen protector for 1/20th the price of this but if you absolutely need the privacy protection then this is your best choice.*** Positive Points: ***- Easy to apply- Works great to prevent others from seeing your phone- Also functions to protect your screen from scratches*** Negative Points; ***- Expensive- Slightly smaller than the actual screen size

The Hot Wheels Track Builder Volcano Blast Trackset is a great set for Hot Wheels Fans.  It basically consists of a volcano where you load up to 8 cars.  Once you wind it up and push the button it starts to gradually send each of the cars down a particular track.  Each path has its own little stunt which keeps things fun.  It also works with other Hot Wheels Track builder sets so it can expanded even further.  It proved to be a lot of fun for 5-7 year old kids in my house but my 10 year old son became bored rather quickly.*** Positive Points: ***- Really fun to watch the cars go down the stunt tracks- Easy to assemble- Sturdy build quality*** Negative Points: ***- Large and difficult to store/cleanup once play time is over- Only comes with one car- Some cars don't work very well.

The Disney Cars Design & Drive Lighting McQeen seems like it would be a great toy for young Disney Cars fans.  The toy is very similar to the old Mr. Potato head toys that we played with in the past only this has car accessories.  It is great for kids up to about 5 years old but does not hold a lot of play value for kids much older than that (even though its recommended age range is up to 10).  My nephew who is 4 enjoyed playing with this for a few days and then quickly forgot about it.  Another thing to note is that the pieces, while easy to put on, don't seem very sturdy.  Considering this is almost $30 it is pretty expensive for what you get and it likely will end up as another unused toy in the toy-box.

My 10 year old son is at the age where he loves Pokemon.  He initially was not interested in this book because of its bug theme but when I told him that maybe it was akin to Pokemon he became intrigued enough to give it a read.  Once he started the book he really enjoyed it.  The book was a bit too easy for him but it kept his interest and it proved to be a hard book for him to put down.  In the end the story is about a war between insects and certain lizards.  It is a fun story that seems to specifically target young boys

We have used a variety of non-stick pans over the years.  Unfortunately most tend to lose their non-stick coating and actually make your food unsafe to eat.  This Fiesta non-stick pan is different.  It has a ceramic coating instead of the traditional Teflon.  This is supposed to be more safe while providing the easy to clean functionality.  Overall this pan works great.  It has a decent amount of weight without being too heavy and it heats up evenly.  The one big downside is that the handle tends to get hot since it does not have any type of shield or covering but other than that this is an excellent choice for a non-stick pan that should last for years.*** Positive Points: ***- Ceramic coating is safer than Teflon- Cleans up very easily and cooking is very even- Good size and weight*** Negative Points: ***- Handle gets very hot since it is not shielded- Instructions advise against using extremely high heat-

I bought this for a 2002 Lexus SC430.  It fit perfectly and was very easy to replace.  There are instructions on YouTube that guide you on how to do this.  The filter looked very similar to the original cabin filter and even had the same carbon lined element to purify the air and remove odors.  It costs a fraction of what Lexus and Toyota want to charge and performs equally well.  The only downside to this filter is that the arrows were not very clear (indicating which way it should be installed) so make sure you look at how your old filter fits into the tray and you wont go wrong.

I thought these were very good speakers for the price and would have rated it 5 stars if I had been able to adjust the volume of the subwoofer. I found the bass a little more thumpy than I tend to like, but there is no way to adjust it on the actual speakers themselves. Not a huge minus, but sort of annoying.

I received one of these free in exchange for an honest review so here it is.This is a multi-purpose portable battery that can be used to jumpstart a car or charge an iPad. It has USB ports for low power devices and gadgets that need more juice. There are instructions included that describe the various power requirements. It is geared more toward smaller vehicles, so don't buy this expecting to jumpstart a Mack truck in the dead of winter. It is small and portable with a nice carrying case and lots of accessories.

I received this free in exchange for an honest review, and here it is. Looks nice, kind of like an old school ipod, so sort of a retro thing going on. I like that it has removable memory. 16 GB is pretty decent space to work with. I listen to audiobooks at night to help me sleep, usually with headphones plugged into my ipad, but i had rolled over and pulled the ipad off my nightstand a couple times. Now I can just use this. No danger of breaking a $500 ipad by rolling over and pulling it into the floor.

I think this is one of my favorite Doctor Who novels. Complex, dark, with witty banter, interesting characters and a fast paced and unique plot. This book is more of an adult level read, and not for kids or fans of the more kooky, outlandish science fiction Who is known for. This is a historically centered novel with more of a political thriller type plot, and I think children would grow bored with it pretty quickly. But for me, a middle aged man with an interest in history and politics, it was an engrossing read. Highly recommended for the more sophisticated Whovian.

This is one of the better Doctor Who novelizations, fleshing out the original televised episode and written in a style reminiscent of the fabulous Frank Herbert. Very well written, fast paced and entertaining.
Worked exactly as I expected it to. Used it to hook up speakers to a turntable.
Loved the episode and wanted to read the novelization, but this book is very poorly formatted. As in, not formatted for Kindle at all. Just pulled off a torrent and uploaded.

Nice packaging and design. Came with lots of accessory parts which I believe are there to hook onto your ears. I didn't need to use them as the device fit snugly into my ears and stayed in while I walked around the house listening to an audiobook. It also came with extra ear pads. Paired to my Mac easily and had a decent range for the size of the device. Overall, I thought it was a good product.

I think part of the problem with all the negative reviews of this book is that it has been so long in coming and so hyped up by the author and fans that there is simply no way for it to be anything but underwhelming. I found Barker's writing style in this novel to be a refreshing change. I have always found Mr. Barker to be a bit verbose, but here his writing is a little more succinct. This novel is about the Hell Priest Pinhead's plot to take over Hell, and from there the other dimensions of creation, including Earth. Supporting characters include angels, demons and Lucifer Himself. Opposing him are the private investigator Harry D'Amour and a ragtag assemblage of offbeat characters who decide to aid Harry in stopping Pinhead and rescuing one of their own, whom Pinhead has abducted to use as bait. Ambitious and unapologetically graphic, The Scarlet Gospels is a satisfying story, with a bit too much chase, and too little character development, but I did not lose interest at any point. I think it will be a little more appreciated in the future, when the hype has died down and people can read it for what it really is rather than what they hoped it was going to be. In the end, I found it to be an enjoyable novel that is ambitious while being a quick read, not something we expect from Barker, who is known for his huge and belabored mega-novels.

I received these free in exchange for a review. Now, I am no audiophile, just a regular music consumer, but I found these to be a very nice set of headphones. The sound reproduction seemed very good, with good bass and good treble. I listen to a lot of different sorts of music, Devendra Banhart, Beirut, Modest Mouse, so a lot of acoustic guitar, horns, electronic sounds. Everything sounded really good. The headphones were extremely simple to pair with my Mac Mini 2014 running OSX Yosemite. Had no problems whatsoever. I am thrilled I got these for free and will be using them extensively so I will report back on longevity. The only criticism I could give them is that they are a little plasticky feeling and light. They do not feel heavy and lux, but that might be a pro for a lot of people who do not want to feel like they have a couple bricks strapped to their heads.

Worked as advertised, though you need to watch your fingers when you get the vegetable down close to the cutting blades. I got my fingertip one afternoon trying to twist a squash too far into the device. My fault completely, but it can getcha if you're not paying attention.
Still using them. I like this much better than an old fashioned wooden spice rack. Can arrange my spices how I like with the labels facing forward for quick retrieval.
Worked perfectly. Good build quality.
Worked well, though I did open it up and do a little customizing on it.
Worked as advertised. Still going strong months later. Good value for the price.
Good, sturdy box springs. My son is a big football player, but this frame is holding up.
Worked as advertised. Have not had a problem with it yet.

Bought this as a replacement remote for our Vizio 3D television. Worked as advertised and have not had a problem from it yet. I initially was put off by the little keyboard on the back of the remote. Seemed strange to me. But it is a sturdy remote and without the slide out to type thingie, it should last longer than the remote my TV came with, which failed at the keyboard mechanism.

Initially thought this was a very nice cover but after about three or four weeks of use the cover seemed very floppy and flappy. Not a bad cover by any means, but it certainly got broke in quick. Maybe  a little too quickly. I read a lot on my iPad and a slightly stiff cover is easier to hang onto when using the iPad as an e-reader. I was not disappointed with the product, but at the same time I was not overly impressed. Decent for the price.

Great stories, but the formatting could have been a little nicer. How hard is it to put a few html codes into a document so there is line spacing below the chapter headings, and maybe some page breaks? I'm sorry, that seems a little nitpicky, but it annoys me to see everything run together when it would only take a day to properly format for the Kindle.
I thought it was very pretty, and my wife seemed to like it.
Good quality and very nice. These earrings catch a lot of light and sparkle very brightly. I was surprised and my wife really likes them a lot.
I was worried my wife wouldn't like these as she usually doesn't wear this type of earring, but she thought they were very nice. Good quality craftmanship as well.
Very pretty pearl earrings. Solid craftsmanship. My wife liked them a lot.
Very pretty earrings, good quality. My wife really liked them.

I generally enjoy all of Clive's fiction, but this one struck me as a little bare bones. The writing was, of course, good, but it seemed like the condensed version of a much larger and more detailed novel. Everything needed to be more fleshed out. Better than 75% of the horror out there, but not up to Mr. Barker's stratospheric standards.

This is an absolutely excellent collection of short stories by one of my favorite authors. Of course, some of the stories in this volume are stronger than others, but that is to be expected of any collection of short fiction. My favorite story in this volume is "The Yattering and Jack" which is a tongue-in-cheek tale of a contest between an average everyday mortal and the demon sent to tempt his soul to damnation. It is hilarious and perverse and I have probably read it about ten times. The Midnight Meat Train is a spine chilling horror story about a man who falls asleep on the subway and wakes to find the other passengers butchered and hanging from the handrails. Very tense and gory, with an ending that will blow your mind. In the Hills, the Cities is a dreamlike story about two competing villages who strap themselves together into mountainous figures to do ceremonial combat. It great because it's so bizarre and original. The other three tales are worth a read, especially Pig Blood Blues, but didn't affect me as much as the three I mentioned previously. If you are a horror fan and have not read the Books of Blood, do yourself a favor and pick up all six volumes. They are cheap and well worth the price.

I thought I'd give this a try. Others might like it but I did not. It turned my beard and mustache dark brown and had a smell I did not care for personally. It did hold decently well. If you have dark brown hair and like strong odors, this might be for you. I will pass.

I've been growing my "epic beard" and needed something to style my whiskers. This is probably the better of the two waxes I have tried out. It didn't discolor my beard, which the other one did, and seemed to have a decent hold. Will not turn your mustache to concrete, but it held decently enough. I was able to style my mustache and beard and have it stay for about half a day. I enjoyed the scent, too, which is kind of citrusy. I have very thick beard hair, but I was actually able to style it, which was surprising.The picture is of my beard after using Fisticuffs Wax.

I really like this cover for my iPad mini. It arrived in good condition. It is sturdy and not too floppy or bendy. Seems like it could take a bit of a beating and still stay in good condition. I like the color of it too. Very nice tone of blue. I would recommend.

Okay this hoodie is just awesome, I love it! Different than any other hoodie I owe and just looks hott on. I do recommend sizing up by a size or even two. Now, I did size up and what I got was a great match for me. Anyhow, this hoodie, is even better than I had expected, it has such a nice design, but the actually hood is just awesome.. it has such a wider shape and larger, while it's hanging, you can see the difference than a common hoodie. Also features a draw string. that works with ease.Sleeves do hang low, which is what I like and as far as length of the shirt it does hang below the hips, which is awesome cause I am not wanting something that will be above the belt in a shirt such as this. Now the model wearing the shir has on a bit differnt color than what I got, but it was just like all the other pictures, I think they are just showing you how it would look like on, still it is what I expected to get.As far as the cut of the neckline, it does come a bit love, and I love that. If you wanted to wear a shirt underneath, you could. The kangaroo pocket is nice and wide, and fitting for little things like keys. For care, I wash in cold water and hang to dry, since the material is stretchy and I wouldn't want it to shrink. I do this to all shirts of like material.Overall, I am pleased with the look and fit. The hoodie does have a awesome western type design and just looks sexy on. It is a must have, for anyone thinking about buying.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The Egaint 7in Phablet is a great choice, if your not looking to break the bank when it comes to buying a phone/tablet. It's priced lower than, some I have seen of it's kind, but don't let the low price fool you. It's got an appealing look and some speed, now it's not the fastest tablet, but your not paying the prices of an IPhone, it is what I would call a bargain price. It comes loaded with the basic apps and already installed is Google Play, which is a huge plus, cause it can be tricky to get. I downloaded all my daily apps, and so far, I have not meet an app that wasn't compatible. Email, Facebook, Twitter, GPS, and even my work apps, worked without a problem.As far as using as a phone, it works with ease.. sending texts, incoming text and calling works just fine, I used my AT&T Unlocked Sim in this phablet, and had no problems. I could hear good, get service, no issues to report. As a tablet, it is a great size, but as a phone, it's going to be huge!This device can also be used for watching movies. We have watched some shows on Netflix, my daughter even watches YouTube and the image is pretty good as for watching videos. Now the image isn't as sharp as a Samsung Galaxy S5, so don't expect that. But for the money, it's got a great image, it is a little dark but not a complaint. I was pretty impressed as far as the image, cause for the price, you really can't expect much. So it was better than I had expected.Speed, it's got some speed, now it's not the fastest running tablet, but it's sure not snail slow. Running the apps are faster than, surfing the web. It is a great tablet for all the basics, just not for multi-tasking, as I would have expected, for such a low cost. I even ran a benchmark test, (I downloaded off Google Play on to the device) which tested out pretty good with no stability issues either.The gyros work speedy, which is something I always look for in a tablet. As soon as you flip it, the screen rotation is fast.For the money, this device has some great features and so far been working just fine, but there is even more. This device has Bluetooth which is pretty much a must have now a days. Which is very impressive as most doesn't have that function and at the same cost. Speakers have a good little sound, but I always want more, so it's not going to be a problem to hook up a Bluetooth speaker or sync with Bluetooth in your car and listen to music from it or talk through it. This device even has dual cameras, now they are the best, but hey.. they do what I need them to do and that's what matters.Lastly, the device has a slim design and appealing look which is really important to me. I have seen a lot of tablets, some do look cheap but this device is not one of them. Also has a good strong body, it's even had some short drops on hardwood and it is still going strong. Has a good feel in the hand and lightweight. Now the battery life isn't that long, but if I need, I can plug up and use while it's charging and that's fine with me.I have to say, yes I am impressed with all the functions for the price of this device, it has everything we have come to expect as far as a tablet. The only difference is, this one comes at only a fraction of the cost. It does have potential to last and make a good tablet, but I also seen that it is backed by a 1 year warranty, which makes it a better choice than competitors, that is certainly something to have. This tablet would be great for using for the basics or for children, it's a must have for the price.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I am always hesitant of electronics that are not mainstream name brands, with that being said.. We go camping quite often and stay for a week at a time in the summer here, on the lake, having bright light at night is a must. Lanterns just aren't the same anymore as they used to be, they are completely different. Anyways, where it took fuel and a lighting it, now they are batteries, which is far more easier and more safe. When I first got this camping lantern, I had to chuckle! Seriously, it's super tiny! I wasn't expecting expecting much at all, that's for sure. Anyways, I was certainly made a fool. I turned this little baby on and my mouth hit the floor! I could not believe just how bright this little thang is, it is surely more than I expected, but also even smaller than I expected. In a small tent, it will light up the entire tent, inside, there is no doubt about that.As far as being small, don't let the size fool you, it packs a bright light and also has many advantages for being so small. For instance, storage space, packing it on the trip and storing at home, it takes up hardly no room. Also, the small size is just better for this type of activity and easier to pack around at night if your traveling back and forth to different tents.This little guy is also light as a feather it seems, but don't let that scare you.. it is durable and constructed quite nice. Made with a hard plastic and is tough, if it falls it's not going to break. What's even more impressive, it's also waterproof! Yes, that is way awesome. Features 5 light modes and is easy to navigate through.What's even greater, is this light doesn't need any fuel haha.. but it doesn't run off batteries either, it charges right off a USB cable. That's right, you will be able to charge it right from the car, if you have USB charging or a cigarette outlet. Heck, if you bring your laptop camping, you can charge from it. Anyhow, on a full charge the battery has an a really decent life, of 4-5 hours. Really that is about all that I would need at night, since it takes longer to get dark on the summer nights.Most importantly, this lantern can be hung, this little feature is a huge feature that would be a deal breaker. I don't think I would want it, for real if you couldn't hang it in the tent.Technology, has sure came along way and this proves it. For such a small device, it really packs brightness. You won't have to worry about a fire. It's small and compact and will not be in the way. Also, has the potential to last for many years, I am just blown away here, it sure is a must have for any camper and will not disappoint.I received this product free, in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The Solar String Lights by LiteXim is different from any other sets, they are much nicer and the look is a lot different, the lighting effect isn't the same far away, of course but up close they are really something! Right out the box they was working and have an automated timer, that will only come on in the dark. They are solar powered so they will never run up the electric bill.The lights are so beautiful and seem to be high quality, the actually "globes" are like a hardened plastic, maybe? They are heavy and durable. Needs to have direct sunlight and make sure you place where they wont be blocked in the afternoon, which will determine the hours you get at night. I am getting about 3-5 hours at night, cause there is trees across the street and the shadow in the afternoon blocks the sun from hitting it. Still yet, 3-5 hours is pretty good.I really don't have anything negative to say about them, only that they were really hard to separate, the wiring was really tight and hard to undo, cause the globes are larger than a common light.They are fancy, though. As far as brightness, they do put out a little amount of light. Also, the wiring from ground to globe could have been a bit longer. As some of the globes are on the rails. They are doing their job though and look amazing. Even surviving a few heavy storms, they are still going strong. I would recommend.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

My guitars mean more to me, than anything I own. I actually do live by a REAL cat lady. She don't have just 3 or even 4 cats, she has about 14 cats at this moment, none of them are "fixed" and they just keep multiplying. I love animals, don't get me wrong, but I sure the heck don't like when they are climbing on my brand new cars and leaving feces in my yard, tearing up my expensive lawn chairs and everything else. It's getting to where it's more than just a nuisance for me and the neighbors. There is no ordinance, where I live. I just have to deal with it. I have tried making mixtures of pepper, cayenne pepper, you name it. Nothing seems to work on them. They are also a bit feral, they will not let anyone around them, only the owner. With that being said, when I first opened the container, one of those cats came right up to me sniffing around and curious, where I was placing it at. It actually drew him out, otherwise he would have never came around me. I used the whole container on a small area, I crossed both porches, I even dumped some on my back porch and in the chairs.Does it work? It's hard to say. I haven't hardly noticed a difference with them, maybe one or 2 stays away, doesn't come around as much?Maybe I need like a 10 gallon buck or 20 of this stuff or just to move! It did not completely rid my problem of them, but I think it could be helping slightly, but only with a few of them. Maybe I am expecting a little too much? But my case of cats may be a little to extreme for something to stop them from coming around. I would just like for them to stay off my porch chairs and off my car and I dumped a whole lot of it around the car and porches.The smell is very strong, but it does seem to die down after being out a little while. We have also had a few good rains since I got it, and the repellent isn't just absorbing completely away. On heavier areas, I can still see it. The repellent comes in a plastic shake container. It's not messy, but will get a little "dusty".I can't say that every cat would be the same and come sniffing it up, like the one did. It's just one of those things you will have to try your self and see if it will work on the cat.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I never use anything plastic in my kitchen involves heat, because of the fear that chemicals can leach through, even a colander. The space saver bags, have been around for ages, I am a first time user of this brand. Honestly, I always thought they was just a gimmick and never bothered to try them out. I worked in Security for around 5 years before transferring to IT Fieldwork. With that being said, I have seen a huge variety if security cameras and know a good one when I see one. Raynic SmartCam is an amazing little gadget and I am blown away by the features and price. My old boss sold analogs for 600 dollars and to this day he still gets that much out of them and that's not even including 99 dollars an hour for installation, running wires and all that can really add up. At that time, I thought his camera systems were marked at a good price, he sold IP cameras for about 1000 or more. Turns out I was fooled for a very long time, I had no idea you could get one just as good on Amazon for only a fraction of the cost. Raynic has a very low cost camera, but don't be scared by the low price. This IP Camera has great quality images. It's not even comparable to my analogs and the thing is you don't need an expensive DVR System to watch it from. This camera runs off an app, you can view it anywhere from your smartphone. My analogs does not allow that, I can view them from a laptop but it has to be live feed.Just like the description, it's pretty much plug and play. There is no installation, running wires, makes holes in the house, going through the attics making sure no wires are seen.. these take the cake by far. There is a little bit of networking to do and you don't need to have a Computer Science degree to hook it up, its easy as pie.This device is small and really not much bigger than the palm of my hand. It is made for the inside, but it would be great if you are looking to protect your business or home. It would certainly make a face, if there was someone who broke into your home. Heck I even place mine in the window during the day, because I have a neighbor that gets kind of wild we have to watch our for, the glass doesn't really bother the IRs to badly in sun, but the glass would hurt the image at night, which is expected.Has a decent image as far as night vision and picks up 26ft.Besides the fact that this camera has an amazing image, it also has Two Way Audio. The camera has a built in mic and speaker that allows you to actually communicate through it, using the app. Using the controls on the app were pretty easy to function and it works great without freezes and bugs. When my old boss at the local security company was selling a two way audio IP camera, those would start at around 1200 bucks, when he probably was ordering them major cheap right here on Amazon and reselling them for hundreds of dollars. Pretty smart!This camera has everything you could want as far as security camera, but even more, this is what I would want as far as having a nursery too, they are way way cheaper than going out and buying an expensive baby monitor, when this one does everything and then some. What I can't get over is the super low price.. I mean yeh I have seen some cheap ones, but Raynics, is extra cheap, especially for all the features. I don't know how they can sell one like this so cheap, my ex boss would have easily sold this type for hundreds of dollars. I am blown away. I would recommend. Now, it is a thin material and not something that is going to keep you warm in snow weather. It is great for windy, cool days or worn under your jacket. It's also nice to have to wear around the home.I could see this lasting a bit, just take care of it and it. Wash in like colors and hang to dry. Now this shirt is pretty hot in the picture, but let me tell ya, it looks even hotter in person! It is now one of my top picks! There is no limit on what you can wear with it.. I do different styles.. sometimes brown boots, with white skinny jeans, any kind of jean and any color will work. There is not limit. If you have a question about size or anything, feel free to leave a comment.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I am young and always looking for a cute bra.. but for nursing bra's there isn't a big selection and one has to go with a "granny bra". However, the HOVEOX Nursing Bra is not a "granny bra"! It's super cute and is actually something I could get by wearing daily. Lots of detail, polka-dot, lace on the at the top of the folds, and wide straps. Amazingly comfy! This is a big thing for me, new mommies need extra softness, since the breast gets so sore, a wired bra does not help, which this bra does not have any wires. I don't have huge knockers, but average.. that being said.. it does give me support.Also included, is clasp extension. Which is a great thought, since a new mom will need the extra extension.To use for nursing, the front will fold down. Then the middle has small sized inserts in the nipple area to over leak protection.This bra is awesome for a nursing mom or even if you don't plan on nursing... it's super soft and great for soreness. I would totally use it everyday. If you are looking for a cute nursing bra and will have you covered, the Hoveox Nursing Bra will not disappoint.I received this product free, in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

While cooking, I never use the counter to sit my utensils, especially when making meats and such. This can transfer any diseases to the counters. I have special trays and such to sit them in, but the germs still get there, which I may forget to bleach them that night if there isn't enough dishes to put in the dishwasher. I always keep a stack of foam plates for this very reason, yes some think I am weird.. but that is just how I am. These cooking utensils are an absolute life save for me, for that very reason. Never, will there be any germs or diseases transferring to my counters as long as the are sitting right. Not only that, but some foods that get on the counter tops are hard to remove, if they dry.Material- handles are soft silicone, feels good in the hand and non slip. The ends are of a sturdy hard plastic. Seems to be something that would last a long time, but could break, that would just depend on how you handle them. You would have to be pretty hard on them, I would think to break one. I don't use them in my ceramic pans, cause I only use silicone. But they are wonderful for anything else. Something else that has really got me impressed is the fact that the materials is free form any harsh chemicals, BPA being one. When this chemical gets high temps, the chemical can transfer and cause bad health issues. I always steer clear of BPA, even in water bottles.Set is attractive and matches my pans nicely.All the utensils in this set, I will always be able to use, where there is some you really just don't need, so not the case here.The soup ladle is really my favorite, it has a point to transfer liquids easier and without splashing. Several have holes and such and are great for noodles and use them for serving utensils, rather than just cooking only.As far as size, these are not small utensils. In fact they are of a larger size, which is what I am looking for.Lastly, these cooking utensils are dishwasher safe. I run them in the top rack, since they are a bit bigger in size for bottom, no damage to them and still look as good as new. Being dishwasher safe is extra important to me, since I have been spoiled by one and hate washing by hand!Nice set and happy to recommend.I received this product free, in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I used to shop local for belts, but, there wasn't much of a selection for men's at a handful of stores, plus the fact that I only wanted leather. Every time I buy a belt local, they bend, break and the material starts peeling off right after I get them, in less than a month. With that being said, I don't think I will have that issue with this belt, not only that it's just a genius idea. I love the fact that I can cut the belt and customize it to my own size. Well, for starters it has a above average leather, it's not thin but not thick. I honestly don't think I will have any issues for short time use and I am confident that I will actually be able to get a long time use from it. At this point, I have not seen any wear and tear, which is very impressive.The Gunmetal buckle, is way cool. I am really digging this buckle. I did notice that this seller had ton's of other varieties in buckles to choose from. Which is the only problem I have noticed, one belt is not enough! I would certainly like to have more buckles and a black belt, as I am sure most will agree.As far as the latching system, it's easy to work, but it will also stay buckled, with out coming undone. Has a good strong latch. To unhook, there is a latch under the buckle and the bottom on the right hand side, just push that and the belt will easily release.I wear this belt for daily wear and for work. I work in the IT Field and required to dress up, no sneakers.. shirt tucked in.. you get the picture. This belt fits the bill for a more formal affair. My shirt tucked in.. the belt looks really nice on and does the job.I couldn't have asked anything more for a belt, it's incredible. This belt is certainly made to last and will easily fit anyone, at a custom fit, it will not disappoint.I received this product free, in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Finding a good fingertip/face towel is a challenge, especially if you are looking online. You don't know what you are getting into. With that being said, I wanted something soft/plush, a towel that doesn't scratch or irritate my hands/face. It's safe to say that the Velour Fingertip Towels by Creative Scents is everything I was looking for and then some. This set is a luxury set and is amazingly soft and has a bit of thickness/fluffiness to them, being absorbent and soft on the touch.As far as quality - they are above average and with a nice embroidery edge. They are more than a hotel towel, that is for sure.The issue I have with towels is when I wash and dry them, they start shrinking, loosing their shape and the threading frays. However, that is not the case here, what so ever. I have washed and dried this set about 5 times now. There wasn't a single loose thread, they did not loose their shape, nor did the shrink. Even at the embroidery, I see a lot of towels close in right there only, these did not. The edges are reinforced and so they will not unravel. I am confident in them as long term use.Another poster said they were too small. They are exactly the size listed. These are not long hand towels, hence the title "fingertip".These towels are so much better than what you can pick up at the local Walmart. They are a luxurious set, absorbent and fast drying. Even makes a great decoration towel. These fingertip towels will not disappoint.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
